string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Beyonce nickname is Bee."
"Beyonces' two favorite things are ‘Pop Eyes Fried Chicken’ and her Antique Convertible Jaguar."
"Beyonce Knowles wrote and produced almost every song on Destiny’s Child’s Survivor CD."
"Destiny’s Child’s hit song, Emotion, is a remake of a Bee Gees hit from the ‘70s."
"Kelly Rowland is Beyonce Knowles’ cousin."
"Beyonce and mother Tina Knowles introduced fashion line House of Dereon in 2004."
"Beyonce got her first name from her mother's name in order to prevent the name from getting lost as mostly the women of the Beyonce family carried the name."
"Bee, Moth and Juju are the pet names that Beyonce's friends have given her."
"Beyonce adopts the personality of Sasha Fierce, her alter ego, while performing on the stage."
"Stevie Wonder and N'Sync are amongst her favourite musicians."
"Tom Hanks is her favourite actor."
"Beyonce was born in Houston, TX on September 4, 1981. Her parents are Matthew Knowles and Tina Beyince. She also has a younger sister, Solange."
"She won her first talent competition when she was 8. She sang John Lennon's Imagine."
"She first got together with LaTavia Roberson and Kelly Rowland when she was 8. The three of them were auditioning for a girls' rap group, Kids Tyme."
"LeToya Luckett joined the other 3 girls in 1993 and they were rechristened Destiny's Child."
"Destiny's Child toured for four years before signing a record deal."
"The group's debut song was \"Killing Time\" for the 1997 film \"Men in Black\"."
"In 1998, the group had a self titled debut album which featured the song \"No, No, No\"."
"In 1999, Destiny's Child released \"The Writing's on the Wall\" which had their most popular music on it. This became their breakthrough album."
"By 2000, Luckett and Roberson had been eased out of the group, replaced by Michelle Williams and Farrah Franklin."
"During a hiatus by Destiny's Child, Knowles recorded her own album, Dangerously In Love."
"About this time, she also started an acting career. Some of her credits include Dreamgirls, Pink Panther and Cadillac Records."
"Knowles performed at Superbowl XXXVIII at the Superdome in Houston in 2004."
"Beyonce also performed at the Neighborhood Inagural Ball for President Barrack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama singing \"At Last\" a ballad first made popular by Etta James."
"Her first solo album is \"B'Day\", which was released in 2006."
"Beyonce's full name is Beyonce Giselle Knowles."
"Beyonce had a cat named Master P who died in 2007."
"Beyonce's favorite makeup is mascara, but she is allergic to perfume."
"Her favorite book is The Rules."
"She don't like cooking."
"In 2003 she starred in a major ad campaign of sexy TV commercials for Pepsi."
"Her sign is a virgo."
"She has this habit whenever her friend, husband or herself releases a CD she goes to the store and buys 8 copies."
"She is ranked fourth in the Top 100 Celebrity in Forbes.com (2008)."
"In grade school, classmates use to taunt her about her ears."
"The word \“bootylicious\” was added to The Oxford Dictionary because her song of the same name became a phenomenon."
"Beyonce was named after her mother’s maiden name."
"In the song \“Signs\” she claims her love for Jay-Z. Guess who’s the Sagittarius?"
"Beyonce Knowles’ bodyguard once broke her toe after standing on it, while trying to protect her from a crowd of fans."
"She is genuinely quiet and shy person."
"Obviously, Bey is obsessed with the #4. Her birthday is Sept. 4th. Her husband Jay-Z’s birthday is Dec. 4th and they got married on April 4th, 2008."
"As a child, Beyonce charged her parents' houseguests $5 each to watch her perform."
"Though she's written most of her lyrics, Beyonce Knowles often has trouble remembering them."
"Beyonce is pregnant - false rumor from 2010th."
"Jay-Z reportedly bought Beyonce Knowles $350,000 worth of designer handbags and purses for Christmas."
"Beyonce Knowles has been named Hollywood's highest-earning popstar of 2010."
"Beyonce was sued by a guy who claims his daily routine was turned upside down by a film crew shooting a Beyonce music video for \"Why Don't You Love Me\"."
"Proving even divas can be playful, Beyonce got buried up to her head while at the beach in Hawaii, April 2010."
"Her /"I am/" World Tour DVD has become the best-selling music video DVD of 2010."
"Beyonce was named Forbes Richest Celebrity Under 30, with a total earnings of $80 million."
